      • helloStringID

        private static final int helloStringID
        Since the ID generated are 3 letter alphabets the ID generated can't be 'GET' as the application will confuse wether its for new Query or already generated query.

        4856 maps to GET.Look at getString(int) for more info

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • doGet

        protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                     java.io.IOException

        Get all the variables Send by SMS Gateway

        Check if the variables are valid

        If not,make status=1 and send that

        Checks if the message is valid

        Checks if the query is a new query or and continued query

        Send the request to be handle by handleGET or handleID

        Overrides:
        doGet in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException

      • handleID

        private void handleID(MessageHandler mHandler,
            java.lang.String pnumber,
            java.lang.String message,
            java.util.Date inDate)
        Handles message whose first word is an ID.

        Check if message is right format.

        Send an SMS to the query

        Checks if the query is answered

        Delete from the cache if the query is answered

        Parameters:
        mHandler - Object which do stuffs related to message
        pnumber - Patient phone number
        message - Patient query
        inDate - Time at which message received

      • handleGet

        private void handleGet(MessageHandler mHandler,
             java.lang.String pnumber,
             java.lang.String message,
             java.util.Date inDate)

        Take a get request

        Identify the keyword

        make a new class from the map and create an object.Generate and ID and assign the object that ID

        Send back an reply and cache the object if necessary

        Parameters:
        mHandler - Object which do stuffs related to message
        pnumber - Patient phone number
        message - Patient query
        inDate - Time at which message received
